channel.title: ggseg on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in ggseg on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.title: New {ggseg} with Geom!
item.description: A new version of ggseg R-package for visualisations of brain atlases was released a couple of months ago . I wanted to create such an update for a long time, but getting the internal logics of a ggplot geom working as I wanted was rather difficult . New {ggseg} with Geom! The position is what I’m truly happy about!
